analysis.description:
Reentrancy in ATTContribution.doBuy (/unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol#915-963):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(ATT.generateTokens(_th,tokensGenerating)) (/unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol#945-947)
	External calls sending eth:
	- destEthFoundation.transfer(_toFund) (/unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol#947-949)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalNormalTokenGenerated (/unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol#949-952)

MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol#200) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol#297-335)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol#414-436)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol#507-521)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol#526-544)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol#607-613) is declared view but contains assembly code
ATTContribution.isContract (/unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol#1073-1082) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol#346-366):
	External calls:
	- ! TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount) (/unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol#362-363)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol#364)

Reentrancy in ATTContribution.issueTokenToGuaranteedAddress (/unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol#963-972):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(ATT.generateTokens(_th,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol#969-970)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalIssueTokenGenerated (/unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol#970-971)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol#653-669) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol#667-668)

ATTContribution.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol#575) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol#620-623)

	- require(bool)(ATT.decimals() == 18) (/unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol#856-857)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- attController (/unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol#859-863)
	- destEthFoundation (/unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol#866)

	- startTime (/unique_chucks/3/0x051fda7486480dd5abcf5dd742ef002a2ebb9ea0.sol#857-858)
